issue.title: www.ask.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.ask.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ask.com%2F) ### Comment > Nothing happens when I type something in the search bar and hit ENTER on keyboard, i have free Adguard DoH enabled in the browser "https://dns.adguard-dns.com/dns-query" which is what's blocking it. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/DcRKdOh.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/DcRKdOh.png)

issue.title: This isn’t a bug it’s more of a question of an issue
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for iOS

### AdGuard version

4.4.5

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Safari

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

flowers

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
I’m trying to figure this out and I still don’t get it maybe I’m just not smart enough to ever get this but if someone could help me I would appreciate 
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>
![8730D42F-14E6-4A20-BC6B-29C60FF744B1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/118444664/214453090-37178966-6308-44af-9f75-c9b259af203e.png)
![09BFB119-E178-4A8B-A2EA-F14106372F02](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/118444664/214453119-103b2c51-035f-48af-bba5-37b552d4b1e3.png)

![E6C409BE-E7BF-4EAD-978F-6443E79E306A](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/118444664/214453216-ece62463-f444-4bc1-9de3-a3bd3679957d.jpeg)


So I hid the element of the flower with my adguard app but it also hid the dog element of exactly where the flower element was grid on Google search 

I’m guessing that’s because there’s not a class= 

so only the flower element is hid but nothing else of a different search of where the flower was is also hid?

I don’t get this can someone please help me I don’t know how to find a YouTube video specifically on this or what but I need someone help please!!!


<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: Dead domains that can be removed from list
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard DNS

### AdGuard version

DNS doesn't have version

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

DNS

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard DNS filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
Hello

I have checked some parts of Adguard DNS list by Godaddy.com and found that 615 domains have no owner and can be bought. This means that the previous owner of the domains did not renew them. So these domains can be removed from list to make this list lighter (Adguard DNS and any other adguard list).
Lists of dead domains that I found can be downloaded in below:
[adguard dead domains.txt](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/files/10494698/adguard.dead.domains.txt)
you can check them yourself on https://www.godaddy.com/domains/bulk-domain-search
If you want, I can check all of the list.

2. Screenshots

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56675802/214440583-8c921d48-2180-4508-84ce-be53f70665a9.png)



### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
